words.def: an open way (generally public) for travel or transportation
In anatomy, towards the oral opening or mouth.
A large European dung beetle , Geotrupes stercorarius , that makes a droning noise while flying.
a unit of absorbed ionizing radiation equal to 100 ergs per gram of irradiated material
a long thin implement made of metal or wood
an implement used to propel or steer a boat
a public promotion of some product or service
a colorless and odorless inert gas
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
